MESSAGE: Press KEY A when the star lands on the BLUE circle!!
Press KEY D when the star lands on the ORANGE circle!!
Press KEY H when the star lands on the PINK circle!!
Press KEY L when the star lands on the GREEN circle!!
Now... time for the real thing!! There is no point system or anything, this is all just for fun!! Enjoy!!
